column1: #text=Today was the big day , I was going to visit some friends in Florida , but I was going to do it in a different way .
#text=I was going to ride a train today for the first time ever .
#text=I loved trains since I was a child and now I would finally get to ride on one and see the countryside .
#text=I bought my tickets online , I did n't want to make a mistake and got to the wrong station .
#text=I had my bags all packed so I called for a cab and headed to the train station .
#text=Once there I took my luggage with me and waited for my train to pull up to the station .
#text=Once the train was here I boarded and found an open car .
#text=I set my luggage in the overhead compartment and sat and waited My ticket was checked before the train left the station .
#text=The train finally pulled out of the station , I was on my way my dream was being realized .
